WorkProjects.title: HR Recruitment Website

WorkProjects.title: Ticket System

WorkProjects.title: Official Business Trip & QR Scanner

WorkProjects.title: Docket System
WorkProjects.description: Application for Admin Department, designed to streamline any letters and keep track of all the documents.
